text: Martensopoda is a genus of Indian huntsman spiders that was first described by Peter Jäger in 2006. it contains three species, found in India: M. minuscula, M. sanctor, and M. transversa. ==See also== * List of Sparassidae species ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Sparassidae Category:Spiders of the Indian subcontinent
title: Martensopoda
